entry.title: Wednesday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
